statements: SELECT * FROM PatientData ORDER BY age DESC, patient_id ASC
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM PatientData WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian'
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM PatientData WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50
SELECT patient_id, age, dosage FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY dosage DESC
SELECT DISTINCT ethnicity FROM PatientData
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender DESC
SELECT patient_id, age, ethnicity FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male' AND dosage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT drug_name, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM PatientData GROUP BY drug_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY avg_dosage DESC
SELECT DISTINCT ethnicity FROM PatientData WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY ethnicity ASC
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age < 25 AND (gender = 'Female' OR ethnicity = 'Asian')
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT patient_id, age FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT ethnicity, age FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_score FROM DrugEfficacy WHERE drug_name = 'Paracetamol';
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND ethnicity = 'Asian';
SELECT drug_name, AVG(efficacy_score) AS avg_score FROM DrugEfficacy GROUP BY drug_name HAVING avg_score > 80 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics JOIN DrugEfficacy ON PatientDemographics.patient_id = DrugEfficacy.patient_id WHERE PatientDemographics.age < 40 AND DrugEfficacy.efficacy_score > 90;
SELECT DISTINCT ethnicity FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT drug_name, dosage, side_effects FROM DrugEfficacy;
SELECT patient_id, drug_id, date_prescribed FROM PatientDrugRecords ORDER BY date_prescribed DESC;
SELECT condition_name, diagnosis_date FROM MedicalConditions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, gender, ethnicity FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND ethnicity = 'Caucasian';
SELECT drug_name, effectiveness, side_effects FROM DrugEfficacy WHERE dosage >= 100 ORDER BY drug_name ASC;

SELECT p.patient_id, pd.age, md.condition_name FROM PatientDemographics pd JOIN MedicalConditions md ON pd.patient_id = md.patient_id WHERE pd.location LIKE '%Hospital%' AND md.diagnosis_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT pr.record_id, pd.patient_id, de.drug_name, pr.date_prescribed FROM PatientDrugRecords pr JOIN PatientDemographics pd ON pr.patient_id = pd.patient_id JOIN DrugEfficacy de ON pr.drug_id = de.drug_id WHERE pr.dosage_taken > 1 ORDER BY pr.date_prescribed DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Drugs WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, efficacy_score FROM DrugEfficacy WHERE efficacy_score <= 3;
SELECT * FROM DemographicFactors WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY education_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Drugs ORDER BY drug_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_id, efficacy_score FROM DrugEfficacy WHERE efficacy_score > 80;
SELECT Patients.patient_id, income, education_level FROM DemographicFactors JOIN Patients ON DemographicFactors.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Drugs;
SELECT patient_id, start_date, end_date FROM Treatments;
SELECT treatment_id, efficacy_score, side_effects FROM Efficacy;
SELECT patient_id, education_level, region FROM Demographics;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_id, Patients.age, Treatments.start_date, Efficacy.efficacy_score FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id JOIN Efficacy ON Treatments.treatment_id = Efficacy.treatment_id WHERE Patients.age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT Treatments.start_date, Treatments.end_date, Drugs.drug_name FROM Treatments JOIN Drugs ON Treatments.drug_id = Drugs.drug_id WHERE Drugs.dosage > 50 ORDER BY Treatments.start_date DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_id, Patients.age, Demographics.income, Demographics.region FROM Patients JOIN Demographics ON Patients.patient_id = Demographics.patient_id WHERE Demographics.income < 50000;

SELECT Patients.age, Treatments.start_date, Efficacy.efficacy_score FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id JOIN Efficacy ON Treatments.treatment_id = Efficacy.treatment_id WHERE Efficacy.efficacy_score > 0.8 ORDER BY Patients.age ASC;
